reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress comfortable, beautiful, and well-made, with one mentioning it hits just above the knee. They appreciate its softness, feeling it like pajamas, and note it's not too heavy. The sizing receives mixed feedback - while some say it's true to size, others find it bigger than expected. The material thickness is a concern, with several customers noting it's thin. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and cute fit
items.body: Comfortable and love the way it fits! Flattering to my plus sized curves and doesn't showcase my belly. The material is soft, stretchy, warm, and good quality. Not see through and thick enough to keep a cold wind from getting through. I love the style and bought another in black! Read more
items.author: Bonnie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress! Love the softness of it!!
items.body: This dress is so comfortable! I was pleasantly surprised at how nice this dress is for the price!♥️ Read more
items.author: Annie Coyne

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Product
items.body: Love the color and style. Side pockets and stops at the top of my knee. Not fitting at the waist, but not extremely full. Fabric is soft with a sweater like feel. The buttons on the side of the sleeves are wooden colored that adds a nice touch. Read more
items.author: Michelle Carson

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute dress
items.body: Sleeves are quite long. On me. They were as long as my hands Read more
items.author: Leslie Schoenfeld

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fit & quality
items.body: This dress feels like a good quality and I love the weight of the material. It's not too heavy but still wrinkle free and warm. I love the long sleeves and the fit is great. I'm 5'4" and size Medium. Great dress, especially at this price. Recommend. Read more
items.author: Julianne

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Something I would expect from a thrift store.
items.body: Cute dress. Very soft and comfy material. Fits loosely, not snug, just as expected. True to size and color. Unfortunately though, it came with a hole in the pocket. (Inside the pocket. Not where you can see it.) I didn’t buy it at a thrift store for $3, it’s not cheep and I expect more for what I payed. I called Amazon and requested a replacement, but they said that was not an option for this item. I gave it a 3 star because it frustrates me that I have to do work to fix their mistakes. Read more
items.author: HH4

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy, light and pockets!
items.body: Love the fit, it's comfy and it has pockets. Read more
items.author: Rosalinda

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, comfortable runs larger
items.body: It runs a little large but I love it It will have to be altered because sleeves cover my hands. Soft, comfortable. It has almost a lavender cast to it in different lights. Supposed to be brown but doesn't look brown to me. However, I love it Read more
items.author: K.J. S.

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Brown Plaid, Purple, Dark Grey, Black Blue, Black, Caramel, Coffee, Green, Red Black Plaid. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
